ios.info.plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This will be added to InfoPlist.strings

SIGNUP.REGISTRATION_TEXT: Please fill up the all fields to correctly complete your registration on BEEZ
SIGNUP.REGISTRATION_MINOR_TEXT: Please fill up the all fields to correctly complete the under-18 registration on BEEZ
SIGNUP.REGISTRATION_CONDITIONS: Cliccando il pulsante di registazione dichiaro di aver preso visione e accettato i nostri temini

CASTINGS.NO_NEW_CASTINGS_TEXT: Siamo spiacenti, al momento non ci sono nuovi castings a cui candidarsi.
CASTINGS.NO_AUDITION_CASTINGS_TEXT: In questa sezione troverai i casting ai quali sei stato selezionato e potrai partecipare. Controlla sempre i nuovi casting e trova quello giusto per te.
CASTINGS.NO_CLOSE_CASTINGS_TEXT: In questa sezione troverai i casting che hai superato con le informazioni sui relativi shooting confermati.
CASTINGS.PARTICIPATION_AGENCY_SELECT_EDIT_TEXT: Sei ancora in tempo per modificare la tua partecipazione o meno al casting.

MESSAGES.NO_CONNECTION: Sorry, BEEZ needs an internet connection.
MESSAGES.CONFIRM_EMAIL: You'll receive by e-mail a link to activate your account, please click the link to complete the process.
MESSAGES.RESET_PASS: Your password has been successfully reset!
MESSAGES.RESET_MAIL_SENT: You'll receive your password reset link by e-mail.
MESSAGES.ERROR_USER: Sorry, we couldn't find a user with that e-mail address.
MESSAGES.ERROR_PASS: Password must contain at least six characters.
MESSAGES.ERROR_EMAIL: Please, enter a valid e-mail address.
MESSAGES.ERROR_ACCOUNT_DOUBLE: Sorry, The email you entered is already present in BEEZ
MESSAGES.ERROR_LOGIN: Unfortunately we couldn't find your account, incorret password or e-mail.
MESSAGES.ERROR_SERVICE: Unfortunately we couldn't reach the server, please try again later.
MESSAGES.SHARE_WITH_A_FRIEND: Hi! Check this casting %s! @BEEZ CASTING HUB https://beez.io
MESSAGES.CANDIDATE: Thank you for signing up for the casting! You will receive an acceptance notification for the auditions.
MESSAGES.ERROR_CASTING_CANDIDATE_ALREADY: You are already enrolled in this Casting, you will soon receive a notification for the auditions.
